TestGroupDocumentation.Title: Content Tree tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the length-3.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a NCName restricted SimpleType. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet001 - checking the unmarshalled content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls the length-3-1.xml document, checks that the document has the value 'bthrough.vendors-transmit_and_is_be.is-the'.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet002 - checking that the method 'get()' returns a set value
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls the length-3-2.xml document, changes the document value to another value 'x.x.x' and checks that the value is changed.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet003 - checking that the method 'get()' returns a set value
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a document, sets the document value to the value 'a.a-b' and checks that the value is set.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet004 - setting a valid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls the length-3-3.xml document, changes the document value to the valid value 'bthrough.vendors-transmit_and_is_be.is-the' and validates the content tree.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet005 - setting an invalid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls the length-3-4.xml document, changes the document value to the invalid value and validates the content tree.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet006 - setting a valid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a document, sets the document value to the valid value 'bthrough.vendors-transmit_and_is_be.is-the' and validates the content tree.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet007 - setting an invalid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a document, sets the document value to the invalid value and validates the content tree.
